title: 4JStudios：PS4 & Xbox One 版 Minecraft 均已准备就绪
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-8-26 21:05 编辑 






4JStudios：#MinecraftPS4 is back with Sony  for final testing. Fingers crossed...
4JStudios：#MinecraftPS4 现在又被提交给索尼进行最后的测试。祝愿好运...

4JStudios：Down to the last few bugs with #MinecraftXbox1  - hoping to hand it over to Microsoft by the end of the week!
4JStudios：#MinecraftXbox1（Xbox One）现在只剩下最后几个bug了 - 希望能够在这周结束前提交给微软！




看起来快好了~Minecraft大法好！
